titles.title: PRISM Act
To amend title 54, United States Code, to make Hispanic-serving institutions eligible for technical and financial assistance for the establishment of preservation training and degree programs.
Preservation Research at Institutions Serving Minorities Act
PRISM Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Preservation Research at Institutions Serving Minorities Act or the PRISM Act
This bill makes Hispanic-serving institutions of higher education (IHEs) as well as Asian American and Native American Pacific Islander-serving IHEs eligible for technical and financial assistance from the Department of the Interior to establish preservation training and degree programs.
